description:
* Ovulation Calendar is an effective software for any woman. Get the Ovulation Calendar for $0.99 only!!.

* Ovulation Calendar calculates the probability of conception based on your fertile day, ovulation days  and this app will also shows the next pregnancy test date.
* By using this app you can increase the chances of having a boy or a girl by choosing the right time for intercourse. 

* Ovulation Calendar can help you avoid an unwanted pregnancy. It calculates the unsafe days taking into account possible variations in your menstrual cycle, helping you avoid an unwanted pregnancy. 

* This app will take minimal inputs like When was the first day of your last menstrual period?, No of days in your menstrual cycle and Number of months and it will calculates and display calender for Fertile,Very Fertile!,Ovulation Day!,Ovulation Test and Test for Pregnancy.

Features:-
* Ovulation Calendar calculates the probability of conception based on your fertile day, ovulation days  and this app will also shows the next pregnancy test date.
* Ovulation Calendar can help you avoid an unwanted pregnancy.
* User friendly interface and easy to use.. 
* No need to connect to internet for getting the result.
